thread.subject: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body:
Dear Majestic Pearl Team,

We are writing to you today to introduce our exciting New Year Rewards Program.  We believe this program would be a perfect fit for your esteemed establishment and would greatly benefit your guests.

Would you be interested in learning more?

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body:
Good morning!

Yes, we are interested in learning more about your New Year Rewards Program. Please provide more details.

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Certainly!  Please find an attached document outlining the program details, benefits, and participation requirements.  We're available for a call to answer any questions you may have.

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Thank you! We've received the document and will review it thoroughly. We'll be in touch shortly to schedule a call.

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Sounds good! Looking forward to hearing from you.

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: We've reviewed the program and are very interested in participating.  Let's schedule a call for tomorrow at 2 PM your time to finalize the agreement.

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program
thread.body: Perfect!  Tomorrow at 2 PM works for us.  We'll send a calendar invite shortly.
